Recipe OptimizeWorkflow
perfect_opt1 (lowmesh)
    perfect_opt2
        perfect_stat (static)
        inducedefect_vac1 (inducedefect)
            defect_vac1_opt1 (lowmesh)
                defect_vac1_opt2
                    defect_vac1_stat (static)
        inducedefect_int1 (inducedefect)
            defect_int1_opt1 (lowmesh)
                defect_int1_opt2
                    defect_int1_stat (static)
